body.name: Finding Love's Sanctuary: A Historical Western Romance Novel
body.description: Accused of an unforgivable crime and shunned by her family, Sarah Sixsmith stands alone, heartbroken, and terrified, with nowhere to turn. Fate intervenes though, presenting her with an escape—a dilapidated ranch bequeathed by a long-lost relative. Eager for a fresh start, Sarah ventures to Redemption Springs, leaving the bustling metropolis of Chicago behind. With her own house and land, she envisions a new life away from the shadowy rumors that once haunted her.Little did she know that an unexpected encounter with James might hold the key to reshaping her fractured world…James Wheeler, scarred by the harsh world, seeks solace in the tranquility of Redemption Springs, determined to bury the ghosts of his past. However, peace eludes him as tensions rise with his antagonistic neighbor, who harbors a vendetta against him. When Sarah inherits a neighboring ranch, James is drawn to her beauty and strength. Yet, a dangerous undercurrent threatens their newfound happiness.Can James escape the shadows of his history, and trust Sarah with his whole heart?Bound by a powerful romance, Sarah and James stumble upon a dark conspiracy involving bribery, cattle mutilation, and the ominous specter of murder. As they navigate this perilous alliance, their shared quest for redemption becomes intertwined with the town's unraveling secrets. Can they find the peace they seek or will their pasts catch up, leaving them adrift once more?"Finding Love's Sanctuary" is a historical western romance novel of approximately 80,000 words. No cheating, no cliffhangers, and a guaranteed happily ever after.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an engaging story involving two different characters deciding to start new lives in Redemption Spring. Sarah moves into a ranch given to her by her aunt, and discovers James and his ranch is her neighbor. Through their attempts to make a successful living on their land, they become aware of unethical happenings occurring among other ranchers and townspeople. As they develop their relationship, they realize they need to work together to battle all those trying to control the town and their livelihoods. As the drama builds, villains become more devious to reach their final goal. Will Sarah and James lose their ranches? Or will they find redemption? The author creates endearing characters, an original plot, and drama-driven scenes keeping the reader engaged. Greed, murder, and betrayals keep the story interesting, and the underlying heartwarming romance keeps it up lifting. Great story. I received a complimentary ARC, but I am voluntarily offering my personal opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sometimes our past chases up with us
reviews.reviewText: This was an interesting story of two people hiding things in their past, one has done wrong and the other is innocent. These two people become neighbors and a bond is formed. Enters a third party who is trying to take the property of the other two. He is an evil man bent on having his way. He has always gotten what he wants and intends for this to be no different. I enjoyed the characters and the plot in this book. It was a different scenario than a lot of books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LIVING IN A SMALL TOWN
reviews.reviewText: Sarah leaves Chicago to move to Redemption Spring, a small town in Texas to a ranch her aunt left her on her death. Sarah was chased by away from Chicago by rumors.James is introduced as gambler, gunslinger in the first chapter. After the fiasco with Hasse he had a wakeup call and moved to Redemption Springs to buy a ranch and get it running. Sarah thought living in a small town would allow her to have a “fresh start”, but rumors began again. Neighboring rancher, Samuel Ragger has different ideas in his mind. He started rumors to take first Samuel than Sarah’s land. Intriguing story need to read to learn the development of Sarah and James romance and finding their redemption. Also, why Samuel is so set to get the land by any means and how the town was able to become more cohesive near the end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sarah inherits a ranch from her aunt and moves to the town of Redemption. She meets her neighbors James Wheeler and Samuel Ragger. She first meets the Reverend Thomas and his sister Grace when gets to town and strikes up a friendship with Grace. Mr. Ragger wants all the land around and he isn't afraid to use whatever means to get it. This is a great story that shows that right always wins in the end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Very Touching Story
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed this very touching story. The writing was captivating. The characters were believable and I cared about them. The plot had many twists and turns dealing with mystery, romance, secrets, and redemption. I would recommend this book to my friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This book by Elaine Shields will keep you turning the pages. It is full of action, drama, secrets, and redemption. The characters are wonderfully written with many of the same flaws we are faced with every day. I loved this story and I think you will too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very entertaining read. There are a few grammar errors and Mrs Ken identities of characters. But overall a pleasant book

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars good wholesome story
reviews.reviewText: A nice story with suspense and the forming of relationships as one gets to know the small town of Redemption. Note: In the kindle version, there were extra spaces between every few sentences which took getting used to.
A good read!, two people with a past ( Sarah and James) meet in a towncalled Redemption, Sarah inherits her Aunt’s ranch and meets her neighbour,James who has the ranch next door…
